name: I Want More - 摸斗摸斗
name_original: I Want More - 摸斗摸斗
description:
Introduction: Wow! The cake looks yum yum, I wanna eat!

A fan game for celebrating Asa Ifrit's birthday!

Instructions: 

on pc, mouse to control hand, click to move

on mobile, click button to switch move state, click to move

Made with: Unity 2021.3.3f1

Game Asset: OtoLogic, Springin, 魔王魂

Source code: https://github.com/aekly268/IWantMore

Blog: https://bunnygame.tw/IWantMore/

===

說明：哇！辣個蛋糕看起來豪豪吃，我要！我還要！

這是個慶祝Asa Ifrit生日的二創遊戲！生日快樂！

操作：

PC平台使用滑鼠控制手、點擊移動

手機平台點擊按鈕切換移動狀態、點擊移動

使用工具：Unity 2021.3.3f1

音樂音效：OtoLogic、 Springin、魔王魂

程式碼：https://github.com/aekly268/IWantMore

網誌文章：https://bunnygame.tw/IWantMore/
